snippet: The owners of the Weather Channel said they would not change Weather Underground, or its devotion to data.
abstract: Weather Channel Cos, owners of Weather Channel and weather.com, will buy one of its rivals, Weather Underground; Weather Underground's ardent fans say the Weather Channel appears to represent the wrong kind of weather information: personality-driven sunniness and hype, rather than the pure science of data; new owners say they will not change Weather Underground or its devotion to data.

byline.original: By JOHN SCHWARTZ and BRIAN STELTER

lead_paragraph: The owners of the Weather Channel said they would not change Weather Underground, or its devotion to data.

headline.seo: As Weather Channel Buys Wunderground, Storm Clouds Brew Among Fans
headline.main: Fans Howl After Weather Site Buys Out Rival
headline.print_headline: A Weather Site Buys Its Rival, To the Distress Of Devoted Fans
